name: No Stick Shooter
description: Happy Robot presents a fresh take on the classic retro-arcade shooters we all know and love. Featuring 30 levels of non-stop mayhem, a huge variety of enemies, strategic weaponry, and a unique control scheme, No Stick Shooter is packed full of explosive fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: Dual core 1.5Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: Quad core 2.5GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory Storage: 250 MB available space
